metadata.title: CVE-2019-19203 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Oniguruma 6.x before 6.9.4_rc2. In the function gb18030_mbc_enc_len in file gb18030.c, a UChar pointer is dereferenced without checking if it passed the end of the matched string. This leads to a heap-based buffer over-read.

criterions.comment: libonig package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.9.4-1').
